page.title: 04Clubs
page.content: {Clubs Flockton, Middlestown and Netherton all now have their respective carnivals, Middestown's organised by the school the others by committees. All three are held within eight days, and some decorated floats enter all three parades. Flockton also has a Horticultural Society show. The most important sports club in the area is the Denby Grange Club, which caters for football, cricket, bowls and tennis. There are other football and cricket clubs a chess club and a wide range of activities for young and old, ranging from the Women's Institute and over 60's clubs, to a young farmer's club, Scouts, Guides, Brownies, St John Ambulance, Youth clubs and Playgroups.
